Text:

coz the title says 720p and the info states as 1080p.

@ onlyHD.......Thx for the help :)

This is the correct info: 1920 x 800 (2.400) at 23.976 fps = 1080p :)

Yeah i am watching this right now in full hd :)

And also you can upload Hotel Chevalier 2007, a short prologue of The Darjeeling Limited, if you wish.

@dalesteyn: Actually i use 21" desktop and also PS3. What about you, mate ?
